resources.string: WorkoutTimer is a fitness application that allows users to create and time their custom workouts.

Creating a Workout: In the Workouts screen, tap the \'+\' icon to naviagate to the Create Workout Screen. From the Create Workout Screen, enter a title for the workout (max 35 characters). Exercises are then added to the workout by entering an exercise name (max 30 characters) and a duration (max 90 mins), and then tapping the \'Add Exercise\' button. The max duration for a workout is 300 mins. Once you have added all the exercises that you require, tap the save icon.

Doing the Workout: Tap the workout tile to navigate the TimerScreen. Once in the timer screen tap the start button to start the Workout Timer. You may also start, stop or restart the workout at any time. Use the back button at the top of the screen to navigate back to the Workouts screen.
Deleting a Workout: In the Workouts screen, swipe any workout tile off the screen to delete it.
